description: Reference config for sync check audits. Used by Claude Code when running a manual sync check, and by the npm run sync-check API script.
consistencyChecks: Contingency formula must be identical in ScrubbTab, generateAllowanceProgressDocument, and CustomerPortal
Grand total must be identical in generateCustomerQuote, generateQuoteHtml, ScrubbTab, and generateAllowanceProgressDocument
NHL Contract = matT + installation_of_home + painting (always grouped this way in Scrubb)
Variance sign: positive = savings (under budget), negative = overage (over budget)

apiScript.note: The npm run sync-check API script is available but Claude Code is the primary sync check method.
